name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download video on Instagram post - FastDL

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utility to support downloading Instagram posts, Download high quality Insta Images, Reels, Audio for free with FastDL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FastDL is a dependable tool designed for Instagram enthusiasts, offering seamless downloading of Instagram content such as videos, stories, photos, reels, and profiles.

FastDL features a user-friendly interface packed with powerful functionalities, making it effortless to preserve your favorite Instagram moments.

🚀Key Features of FastDL :
✍ Video Downloader: Download Instagram videos in the highest quality available, including up to 4K resolution.
✍Photo Downloader: Capture Instagram photos in their original full size with just a few clicks.
✍ Story Downloader: Easily save Instagram Stories and Highlights for later viewing.
✍ Profile Downloader: Retrieve Instagram profile photos in stunning HD quality.

How to Use FastDL on Chrome Browser:

💘Open your Chrome browser and go to Instagram.com.
💘Find the photo or video you wish to download.
💘Click the "Download" button located in the top right corner of the photo or video.
💘A new tab will open, displaying the content. Simply save it directly to your device.
💬Important Note:
Ensure you refresh the tab containing the video or photo after installing the extension for FastDL to detect the file correctly.

We value your feedback! Please reach out to us with any suggestions or concerns to help us enhance the extension's performance.
